Cheryl Jacques, chairman of HRC, was asked to resign her position Tuesday after a tele-conference between her and other board members, Monday.
 
 Read the article:
 
 http://advocate.com/new_news.asp?ID=14468&sd=12/01/04
 
 Then voice your input.

Can't really decide what I think about this, but I don't see it as good or bad either. I just wish the HRC spent more money on educated the public in some large scale way. That is what the Focus on family are doing to turn people against gays, occasionally turning to some shady stuff.
 
 Why can't HRC do something to promote large scale understanding of gays and lesbians? TV ads? Print ads in the papers? a cool clogan?

 I agree. 
 I can't say I'm sad to see Cheryl go. I thought since she took over way too much time and energy was being spent on $200 a plate dinners, $400 a person galas and the like.
 I found it elitist and pandering. 
 I had a long talk with Elizabeth Birch this past summer. Jokingly she invited me into a betting pool with Hilary on how long Cheryl would last.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Cheryl Jacques...GONE from HRC
